MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH21 and EH22 postcode areas of Musselburgh and Dalkeith. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified faulty overhead line equipment located near to Clements farm and we now expect your supply to be restored by 9pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:40pm on 15th November 2020.
